title: Peaks to Pedals: How John Gaston Pivots from Elite Skimo Racer to Leadville Podium Contender
content:
Gaston has twice been on the podium at the Leadville 100. After this weekend's 100-mile race, he's shifting gears to prepare for the 2026 winter Olympics.

Read the full article at Peaks to Pedals: How John Gaston Pivots from Elite Skimo Racer to Leadville Podium Contender on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
